/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Tall buildings, their facades a mix of modern and traditional styles, line the street, their windows reflecting the world around them. Cars, parked and in motion, add a dynamic element to the scene. The perspective of the image is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
